text: They had not long separated, when Miss Bingley came towards her, and said, "You never know what's going to happen in thirty seconds?" #PrideAndPrejudice

passages.fragment: They had not long separated , when Miss Bingley came towards her , and
passages.full_quote: <used>They had not long separated, when Miss Bingley came towards her, and</used> with an expression of civil disdain accosted her: "So, Miss Eliza, I hear you are quite delighted with George Wickham"
Mr. Darcy drew his chair a little <used>towards her, and said</used>, ``"

passages.fragment: and said , `` You never know what 's going to happen in thirty seconds ?
passages.full_quote: Miss Susan looked at her pityingly <used>and said, "You never know what's going to happen in thirty seconds</used>?"
